name: Boolean
description: Booleancoin, an ERC20 Compliant Token, will be the medium for transacting within Boolean, as well as have a profit-sharing model, allowing for holders of the token to be rewarded with more tokens and/or other cryptocurrencies. Booleancoin is a store of value whose price is determined by the market, a token representing user contribution to the Boolean platform in the case of profit sharing and rewards, as well as a payment mechanism for Boolean across the Ethereum Blockchain, holders getting Enterprise Access to the plugins/platform for use of Boolean's Software. Only 20,000,000 Booleancoins will ever exist.
